SVGRectWidth.summary: The width property of the interface is an alias for the property. It describes the horizontal size of the element. It reflects the SVG element's {{SVGattr("width")}} attribute and the CSS {{cssxref("width")}} property.

remarks.para: The width is a length; it is the distance from the left of element to the right of the element in the the user coordinate system. Its syntax is the same as that for <length>.
